/**

 * Difficulty level configuration for styling
 * @constant {Object}
 */const DIFFICULTY_CONFIG={beginner:'difficulty-badge--beginner',intermediate:'difficulty-badge--intermediate',advanced:'difficulty-badge--advanced'};/**
 * StatusBadge Component

 * @returns {JSX.Element} Rendered difficulty badge

 * Home Component
 * Main dashboard displaying all lessons with progress tracking
 *
 * Features:
 * - Loads and persists lesson progress from localStorage
 * - Displays lessons in a responsive grid layout
 * - Shows visual status indicators for each lesson
 * - Handles errors gracefully when localStorage is unavailable
 *
 * @returns {JSX.Element} Rendered home dashboard
 */function Home(){const[lessonProgress,setLessonProgress]=useState({});const[loadError,setLoadError]=useState(null);/**

if(parsed&&typeof parsed==='object'&&!Array.isArray(parsed)){setLessonProgress(parsed);}}setLoadError(null);}catch(error){console.error('Failed to load lesson progress:',error);setLoadError('Unable to load your progress. Learn React through interactive lessons and hands-on coding exercises."}),progressStats.completed>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"home-hero__progress",role:"status","aria-live":"polite",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"progress-stat",children:[progressStats.completed," of ",progressStats.total," lessons completed"]})})]}),loadError&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"home-error",role:"alert",children:loadError}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"home-lessons","aria-labelledby":"lessons-title",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{id:"lessons-title",className:"home-lessons__title",children:"Learning Path"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"lessons-grid",children:lessonsWithStatus.map(lesson=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LessonCard,{lesson:lesson,status:lesson.currentStatus},lesson.id))})]})]});}export default Home;
